description: Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `decodeJson()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `render()`. 1 params expexted but got 2. Got `array $options` but expected to be `array $context`. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
